allow:
Bash(# Core機能をcoreサブディレクトリに移動
mv src/refinire/llm.py src/refinire/core/
mv src/refinire/anthropic.py src/refinire/core/
mv src/refinire/gemini.py src/refinire/core/
mv src/refinire/ollama.py src/refinire/core/
mv src/refinire/message.py src/refinire/core/
mv src/refinire/tracing.py src/refinire/core/
mv src/refinire/trace_registry.py src/refinire/core/)

Bash(# Flow関連機能をflowサブディレクトリに移動
mkdir -p src/refinire/flow
mv src/refinire/flow.py src/refinire/flow/
mv src/refinire/step.py src/refinire/flow/
mv src/refinire/context.py src/refinire/flow/)

Bash(# Pipeline機能をpipelineサブディレクトリに移動
mkdir -p src/refinire/pipeline
mv src/refinire/llm_pipeline.py src/refinire/pipeline/
mv src/refinire/pipeline.py src/refinire/pipeline/)

Bash(# Agents機能をagentsサブディレクトリに移動（refinire-agentsから最新版を取得）
mkdir -p src/refinire/agents
cp refinire-agents/src/refinire/agents/gen_agent.py src/refinire/agents/
cp refinire-agents/src/refinire/agents/clarify_agent.py src/refinire/agents/
cp refinire-agents/src/refinire/agents/extractor.py src/refinire/agents/
cp refinire-agents/src/refinire/agents/validator.py src/refinire/agents/
cp refinire-agents/src/refinire/agents/router.py src/refinire/agents/
cp refinire-agents/src/refinire/agents/notification.py src/refinire/agents/)

Bash(# agentsに必要な依存関係をflowから参照できるように調整
# まず、agents内のファイルがflowとstepに依存している問題を解決)

Bash(# 残りのagentファイルのインポートを一括修正
cd src/refinire/agents
grep -l "from \.step import\|from \.context import\|from \.llm_pipeline import" *.py)

Bash(# refinire.core関連の修正
sed -i 's/from refinire\.core/from src.refinire.core/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_anthropic_extra.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.core/from src.refinire.core/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_gemini.py  
sed -i 's/from refinire\.core/from src.refinire.core/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_get_available_models.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.core/from src.refinire.core/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_ollama.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.core/from src.refinire.core/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_tracing.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.core/from src.refinire.core/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_tracing_integration.py)

Bash(# refinire.agents関連の修正  
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_context.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_extractor_agent.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_flow_constructor.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_flow_show.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_gen_agent_modern.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_notification_agent.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_router_agent.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_step.py
sed -i 's/from refinire\.agents/from src.refinire.agents/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_validator_agent.py)

Bash(# refinire直下のインポートの修正
sed -i 's/from refinire import/from src.refinire import/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_clarify_agent.py
sed -i 's/from refinire import/from src.refinire import/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_llm_pipeline_tools.py)

Bash(# agents.context -> flow.context に修正
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.agents\.context/from src.refinire.flow.context/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_context.py

# agents.step -> flow.step に修正
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.agents\.step/from src.refinire.flow.step/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_step.py

# agents.flow -> flow.flow に修正
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.agents\.flow/from src.refinire.flow/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_flow_constructor.py
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.agents\.flow/from src.refinire.flow/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/tests/test_flow_show.py)

Bash(# refinire.core関連の修正
for file in /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/*.py; do
  sed -i 's/from refinire\.core/from src.refinire.core/g' "$file"
done)

Bash(# refinire直下からの統合パッケージインポートに修正
for file in /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/*.py; do
  sed -i 's/from refinire import/from src.refinire import/g' "$file"
  sed -i 's/from refinire\./from src.refinire./g' "$file"
done)

Bash(# 統合構造に合わせて修正が必要な箇所を特定・修正
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.processor/from src.refinire.core.processor/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/trace_cli.py
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.llm_pipeline/from src.refinire.pipeline.llm_pipeline/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/*.py
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.context/from src.refinire.flow.context/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/extractor_agent_example.py
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.flow import Flow/from src.refinire.flow.flow import Flow/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/flow_show_example.py
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.step/from src.refinire.flow.step/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/flow_show_example.py
sed -i 's/from src\.refinire\.context/from src.refinire.flow.context/g' /mnt/c/Users/kitad/workspace/agents-sdk-models/examples/flow_show_example.py)
